messages.subject: Ren-RISD
messages.msgSnippet: Ren!  I think you should pursue that!  What creative ways are there to start saying yes to yourself?  Are there some prerequisites you can take at your local
messages.messageBody:
Ren! I think you should pursue that! What creative ways are there to
start saying "yes" to yourself? Are there some prerequisites you can
take at your local community college? Online courses you can take?
Portfolio requirements you can start to assemble? Savings you can
start? Start working on it now--when I started flamenco it was just one
hour per week and although i reeeeeallly wanted to do more I still had a
small toddler and not enough money for more. Slowly I got to do more
and more as the opportunities arose, and while I still don't do it as
often as I'd like, I am still slowly learning more and more. Start
now! I can so totally see you at RISD someday.

Jenny
